dataset_name: Migrant Employee's Registration by Manpower Level
resource_section: Total Migrant Employee’s Registration with the SLBFE by Manpower Level 1994 – 2024
remarks: Dataset contains SLBFE (Sri Lanka Bureau of Foreign Employment) registration statistics by manpower level for 2024, showing the distribution of registered workers by skill level. Columns: Year, Skilled, Skilled %, Low Skilled, Low Skilled %, and Total. Data shows that in 2024, skilled workers totaled 244,467 (77.66%), while low-skilled workers totaled 70,319 (22.34%), with a total of 314,786 registrations. This indicates a significant majority of skilled workers in foreign employment registrations.
